attributes.action: Make the Swanscombe train station disabled and pram friendly
attributes.additional_details:
I Marilyn Uys and my friend  Havana Greaves would like to make available a step free option at Swanscombe train station,
Currently, the station lacks a slope or elevator therefore the station in inaccessible to the elderly, disabled and families with pushchairs , many people are unable to use the station because of this reason.

Please support our community and sign our petition for easier travel for the future
